name: Hot Pot Fight
description:
Move your Chopsticks. Find the best timing and position. Catch your favorite food!

(about the food, the smaller, the better!)

(of course avoid the food you hate!)

Player One

Move: A / D

Get Food: S

Player Two

Move: J / L

Get Food: K

Restart: R

Quit: Esc

Made for Prototype Studio Week 11

Prompt: "Food"

Instructor: Bennett Foddy 

*currently it's a prototype which only supports 2 players*

*I might make a version which supports 1 - 4 players in the future*
